Description: Minta pihak Air Selangor alert dengan pekerja yang datang betulkan/tukarkan pipe di kawasan perumahan/premis. Minggu lepas, pihak syabas datang ke premis saya dan dapati pihak tuan/puan mengambil kesempatan dengan membocorkan pipe di ruang hadapan kedai yg sebelum ini memang berkarat dan tidak bocor. Selepas sahaja mereka datang dan membuat kerja, mereka maklumkan kepada saya ada bocor di bahagian bawah yang menyebabkan air tidak naik ke tangki dan paip luar. Sebelum mereka datang buat kerja, air seperti biasa naik ke tangki. Ini menyebabkan saya dan pekerja lain tidak dapat menggunakan air jika kecemasan. Saya tahu pihak pekerja tuan/puan sengaja membocorkan pipe hadapan supaya mereka boleh charge (upah) untuk membaiki pipe tersebut dengan harga Rm200 seperti yang mereka maklumkan pada saya. Di bawah saya buktikan gambar bocor tersebut yg sebelum ini saya tidak pernah dengar air mengalir laju pada bahagian bawah.

Description: Saya nak buat aduan tentang maintenance dari air selangor. Pada jam 7 lebih malam semalam, staff air selangor hubungi dan ws saya untuk tanya number meter, berikutan aduan saya dibuat tentang paip pecah pada meter rumah saya. Tetapi tidak sampai 30 minit kerja pembaikan dibuat. Staff tersebut terus balik dalam keadaan meter tidak ditukar dan paip masih bocor air memancut. Malah air juga tiada. Sedangkan staff tersebut membuat akuan bahawa takkan ada masalah gangguan air di rumah saya. Kemudiannya, saya cuba menghubungi dan ws staff tersebut tetapi tidak berjaya. Telefon telah dimatikan. Number yang berhubung dengan saya adalah 014 9377 886. Saya telah cuba hubungi number tersebut sehingga jam 9 malam. Tetapi masih tidak berjaya. Disini ada kecuaian dan ketidaktelusan staff air selangor dalam membuat kerja. Saya terpaksa bertahan kerana ketiadaan bekalan air secara tiba2. Tidak jujur dalam melakukan kerja juga membuatkan saya berasa tidak puas hati dengan servis yang diberikan. Servis sangat tidak memuaskan, malah staff pula sengaja mematikan telefon bimbit. Ini tidak sepatutnya berlaku.

Description:
1. This is my second complaint regarding #SA-1182255. This was a report on an underground leak of a pre-meter public pipe that caused a sink hole on my property.
2. The report was lodged at approximately 0930 on 21/12. A Syabas technician called two hours later without any information regarding my report, and I repeated the facts. Follow-up calls to your 15300 service desk were frustrating, as each call required a complete repeat of the facts. 
3. A Syabas contractor called me at 1730, saying he had just been informed of the "leak" and asked me for further details. I repeated the facts for him. 
4. The Syabas contractor team arrived at 1830, excavated a portion of the road and my pavement, revealing a much larger sinkhole then was previously visible. Worse still, the sinkhole was right next to a Telekom post.
5. They returned the next morning (22/12) to complete (what you refer to as) "finishing" works.
6. I was not happy with the quality of this work and lodged my first written complaint after being advised to do so by a 15300 service desk team leader. Another team leader took the initiative to personally call Syabas' Petaling office to ensure rectification of defects in the finishing work, and then called me directly to let me know that the Contractor himself would inspect the Finishing Work. 
7. The Syabas automatic no-reply update emails continued to state my work order was complete, which was frustrating to say the least.
8. Your contractor. Mr. Omar Omya inspected the Finishing Work performed by his workers, yesterday evening (22/12).
9. He fully agreed the work was incomplete and sub-standard.
10. He agreed to re-do the Finishing Work.
11. A foreign worker arrived this morning (23/12) to remove the initial premix
12. As he did so, we noted a gaping hole that was NOT FILLED IN by the first Syabas contractor team.
13. This is completely unacceptable, posing a risk to both vehicle and human safety.
14. Attached are two files. One photograph of the initial, defective Finishing Work, The other, a photograph of the gaping hole revealed when the foreign worker removed some of the initial premix. I have a video with more detail, but your system does not allow uploading of videos.
15. Syabas is either accepting of this shoddiness, or should take immediate remediation steps in governing and managing contractors.
16. I strongly suggest the Syabas service desk and complaint resolution teams escalate and involve Syabas management in dealing with this complaint, so that contractor management issues may be identified and remediated.
17. Left alone, no matter the corporate vision or high-level policies, your district offices and their contractors will continue to do as seems good in their eyes, leading to not only complaints like mine, but to eventual vehicle and human safety risks.
Location: 243 JLN DESA MESRA TMN DESA KL *, KL, 58200
Comments: Sudah buat balik dah bagi tau en halim

However contractor only  dig trench infront of Rumah No.16 using Backhoe, and involved area approx 14ft (L) x 5ft (W) (this area not including the Rumah No.18)

2) Due to the trench digging using Backhoe, some damages occurred (refer attached picture):
i) Some of the slab crashed and break, the BRC underneath the slab also damaged, void (empty space) created due to crusher run refill not fully filled. (RED area)
ii) Some of the tiles chipped due to the Backhoe stable leg pressure (multiple places) (Yellow area)
iii) Contractor promised to resurface the excavated area. however they said they wont touch other area, which some road surface (tar surface) damaged due to Backhoe front loader and stable leg. (Green Area)

3)  The replacement pipe works is professionally done and swiftly. We appreciate Air Selangor taking good care to their property and user. We understood some damage will occurred no matter how. Hence we would like to request Air Selangor to make good the damaged area. Thanks

*** By the way, the Longkang are filled with sand/soil, hence would like to inform Air Selangor to look into this matter, as the sand/soil is higher than water level***

I am writing to make a complaint about  AIR SELANGOR contractor, TRUCON RESOURCES,  on the job done to my house, No. 40 Jalan TEMPUA 15, Bandar PUCHONG Jaya. Job ID 04899771.

Originally my piping was across the drain with leakage. I requested the new pipe to be done like my neighbour next door,with meter standing upright.

The said comtractor insisted of doing their way and now the PIPE IS RESTING ON THE DRAIN. This contractor simply want an easy job and the job completed in half an hour

I have a BIG problem now to shift the meter as it is near to my neighbour's wall...need to hack his wall to put in pipes...My neighbour asked me to complain to Air Selangor for the poor workmanship of the contractor.

I believe Air Selangor has quality control over the workmanship of the contractors.  Such contractors who did the job at their own fancy and caused inconvenience and hardship to customers should be disqualified and blacklisted.


Thanking you in advance and appreciate if your good office can look into my complaints and arrange someone to rectify the PIPE RESTING ON THE  DRAIN.

Description:
Aduan Mengenai Penggantian Jalan Dengan Jubin Simen di [25, Jalan Pasir Emas 2, Taman Pasir Emas, 43000 Kajang, Selangor.]

Saya ingin mengemukakan aduan berkenaan dengan perubahan yang telah berlaku di kawasan kami. Baru-baru ini, saya mendapati bahawa jalan di [25, Jalan Pasir Emas 2, Taman Pasir Emas, 43000, Kajang, Selangor) telah digantikan dengan jubin simen oleh pihak Air Selangor semasa kerja-kerja penggantian paip air.

Kami memahami bahawa kerja-kerja penyelenggaraan dan penggantian infrastruktur air adalah penting, tetapi perubahan ini telah menyebabkan ketidakselesaan yang ketara kepada saya.

Saya ingin menyarankan agar Air Selangor mempertimbangkan semula pilihan penggantian yang telah dibuat dan mungkin mencari alternatif yang lebih sesuai seperti menggunakan tar jalan.

Kami berharap agar pihak Air Selangor dapat mengambil tindakan yang sewajarnya bagi mengatasi masalah ini 
Sekian, terima kasih atas perhatian pihak Air Selangor terhadap aduan ini. Kami berharap perkara ini dapat diselesaikan dengan baik.

-pada 16/08/2023 pihak kontraktor telah datang menggali semula lubang dan didapati satu laluan paip jenis poly dipercayai saiz 32mm-50mm diameter telah di pasang dari lokasi paip besar menuju ke bawah jalan genting klang masuk ke bawah road kerb seterusnya ke longkang tepi jalan kemungkinan utk mengalirkan air bocor pindah ke longkang. 
- pemasangan paip poly yg bertujuan utk mengalirkan air bocor masuk ke longkang adalah tidak mengikut S.O.P dimana kebocoran tersebut haruslah di kimpal / dibaiki bukannya di alirkan menggunakan paip poly saiz kecil diaman ianya akan menyebabkan mendapan tanah di lokasi bocor. Mohon pihak SYABAS ambil perhatian ketidaksempurnaan kerja2 ini demi keselamatan dan keselesaan pengguna jalan raya.
Location: 201588, Jalan Genting Kelang, Taman P Ramlee, Kuala Lumpur, Kuala Lumpur, 53000, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Gombak, Malaysia,
Comments: Kerja pembaikan semula premix mendap sudah dibuat..

We like to report on the road pavements sagging-in of at the patched site after roadworks performed by Air Selangor last week.

Please help mitigate this by re-paving the pavement area immediately.

Thank you.

Description:
Kejadian paip pecah pada 05 Nov 2023 yg berlaku di Lot 7 Tmn Sepakat, Jln AU 3/12 adalah dirujuk.

2. Kerja kerja pembaikan selesai pada 22 Nov 2023.

3. Pada 23 Nov 2023 hujan lebat bermula pada waktu petang hingga larut malam telah mengakibatkan runtuhan dinding batu bata longkang yg baru saja selesai dibaiki.

4. Runtuhan batu bata ini telah menyekat aliran air longkang yg deras seterusnya telah menyebabkan keseluruhan lantai rumah kami dinaiki air..!!

5. Kerugian kami adalah sejumlah hamparan karpet diruang tamu yg sebahagiannya adalah merupakan pemberian hadiah drp saudara mara kami di Isfahan, IRAN.

6. Kontraktor telah mengambil keluar longgokan batu bata drp longkang tetapi hingga ke saat ini dinding longkang yg runtuh masih belum dibaiki.

7. Kejadian yg tersebut telah mengujudkan sebuah lubang besar berada betul betul di bawah laluan keluar rumah kami.

8. Hujan monsoon sekarang ini sangat merisaukan kami memandangkan terdapat seorang nenek tua dan seorang warga emas yg kurang upaya terlantar di atas katil di dalam rumah kami.

9. Adalah diharapkan aduan ini mendapat perhatian dan kerjasama pihak tuan dlm tindakan penyelesaiannya dan kami dahului dgn ucapan ribuan terima kasih.

p/s: kami sertakan beberapa gambar dan video utk rujukan tuan.
Location: Lot 7, Taman Sepakat, Jalan AU 3/12, Taman Keramat, Kuala Lumpur, Kuala Lumpur, 54200, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Gombak, Malaysia,

Salam sejahtera,
Saya hendak membuat aduan berkenaan kobocoran yang berlaku di paip rumah saya setelah pihak kontraktor membuat pengubahasuaian paip tersebut dengan alasan tidak sesuai berada di bawah.

Kontraktor terbabit telah membaiki paip di depan rumah (bawah tanah). Kemudian mereka tiba-tiba membuat sistem paip baru ke rumah kami dengan alasan tidak sesuai. Bertahun-tahun tidak diubah tapi selepas berubah dalam masa 2 minggu terjadi kebocoran.

Bagaimana ini boleh menjadi tanggungjawab kami sedangkan bertahun-tahun kami guna tiada masalah pun? Harap perkara ini mendapat perhatian dari pihak Air Selangior untuk mengelak masalah ini berpanjangan dan saya menganggap ini adalah dari kecuaian kontraktor Air Selangor.

Terima kasih.

Description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Complaint about Incomplete Repair After Burst Pipe Incident

I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the service provided by the appointed contractor, TIRAI SEMARAK SDN BHD, after a recent incident in front of my house. On the 13th of October 2023, a pipe burst occurred outside my residence at:

NO 35 JALAN 22/62
Bandar Menjalara
Kuala Lumpur,  Wilayah Persekutuab
52200

The incident was promptly reported to your Air Selangor contractor, TIRAI SEMARAK SDN BHD, was dispatched to repair the damaged pipe. While I appreciate the prompt response, I must bring to your attention a significant issue that has not been adequately addressed.

Following the pipe repair, I noticed that the fence outside my house, which was directly affected by the incident, was left in a state of disrepair. The fence, which serves as a boundary for my property, is now damaged and poses a safety hazard. Despite my initial expectation that the contractor would ensure that the affected area is restored to its original state, no repairs or rectifications have been made to the damaged fence.

The activity ID for the repair is 0599 48183, and I believe that this incomplete restoration of my property is a clear violation of the agreement between your Air selangor and the contractor. I kindly request that you investigate this matter promptly and ensure that the necessary repairs are made to restore my property to its original state. This is essential not only for the safety of my family but also for the overall appearance and integrity of the neighborhood.

I have attached relevant photographs of the damaged fence for your reference. I urge you to take swift action to rectify this situation and prevent such oversights from occurring in the future. I look forward to a prompt resolution to this matter and request that you keep me informed of the actions taken.

Thank you for your attention to this issue. I trust that your Water Authority will address this concern promptly and professionally.

Sincerely,

Wan Lock

SentÂ fromÂ myÂ iPhone

Description:
Kerja-kerja pembaikan kebocoran paip di depan halaman rumah saya telah selesai dilaksanakan oleh kontraktor yang dilantik. Kesemua kerja-kerja yang dilaksanakan adalah di bawah pembiayaan Air Selangor termasuk kerja-kerja menutup semula lubang yang telah digali sebagaimana keadaan sebelumnya. Nama apa yang menyedihkan, selepas 2 hari kerja-kerja dilaksanakan, tiada lagi tanda-tanda pihak kontraktor yang terlibat datang untuk menutup semula kawasan yang korek menggunakan tar. Pihak kontraktor hanya meletakkan batu bata bagi menutup kawasan tar yang telah dikorek. Ini secara tidak langsung mencacatkan pemandangan di bahagian laam rumah saya.

So, mohon Air Selangor untuk mengarahkan pihak kontraktor yang terlibat untuk menutup semula kawasan yang di korek menggunakan tar sebagaimana keadaan sebelumnya.

Sekian terima kasih.
Location: 11 JLN PUJ 7/19 TMN PUNCAK JALIL BDR PUTRA PERMAI, 43300, SERI KEMBANGAN, SELANGOR, SL, 43300
